Dwarven Toughness

Gold Dwarf is a Subrace of Dwarf in Baldur's Gate 3. Gold Dwarf starts with a bonus 1 Hit Point and gains another point each time they level up. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their speci
